name: Bowimi
description: Bowimi is the new, most engaging way for brands to get their target consumers sampling their product. By using WiFi in venues we deliver instantly redeemable vouchers alongside full-screen content straight to consumers' mobile phones. Our Vision? A world where no brand struggles to get their products into the hands of consumers and tell their story.

team.name: Dominic Bowcock
team.bioHtml: Founder @dominic-11 • Worked at @Kantar TNS, @Candy Mechanics

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
About Bowimi:
Bowimi uses WiFi to detect consumers in a venue and send them an instantly redeemable free drink on behalf of a brand looking to get liquid to lips. 

Your role:
You will work alongside the founders to help set the product roadmap, build new features and improve existing ones. 

About you:
You will meet most of our key requirements including:

Experience developing web applications
Excellent all-round programming skills (any language)
Good backend skills
Good Javascript skills

You might have some of our value-add requirements:

Experience with FreeRADIUS, RADIUS Authentication, WiFi hardware and installation.
AWS skills (S3, Elastic Beanstalk and more)
Experience of Javascript frameworks, particularly React.js

We are open minded about where you developed your skills. We anticipate hiring a senior or mid-level developer, but if you believe you are an exceptional early-career candidate (with significant personal development experience), we encourage you to apply.
